definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: : 1Sa 5:4 god & idol of Philistines (cf. As. Dagan, Dakan(nu), name perh. non-Shemitic COT Ju Jdg 16:23 Dl:Pa 139 Sayce:Rel. Bab. 188 f. but v. Jen infr.)—god of Ashdod, exc. Ju Jdg 16:23 (Gaza) & 1Ch 10:10 (but cf. infr.);—[[דגון אֱלֽהֵיהֶם]] Ju Jdg 16:23 cf. [[דגון אֱלֽהֵינוּ]] 1Sa 5:7, ´[[בֵּית ד]]1Sa 5:2, 1Sa 5:5, 1Ch 10:10 (here hardly orig. cf. ‖ 1Sa 31:10 & We Dr); ´[[כּׂהֲנֵי ד]] 1Sa 5:5, ´[[מִפְתַּן ד]] v:1Sa 5:5; as name of image ´[[ד]] ([[אֵחֶל]]) v:1Sa 5:2, v:1Sa 5:3, v:1Sa 5:4, [[דגון נׁפֵל]] v:1Sa 5:3, v:1Sa 5:4, [[נִשְׁאַר עָלָיו]] ´[[רַק ד]] v:1Sa 5:4 (but sense difficult; We prop. [[דָּגוֹ]] only his fish, i.e. fishy part, was left upon him, v. also Dr;—but was Dagon a fish-god ? Cf. works cited above & Scholz:Götzendienst 238 ff., Baud in PRE:2 iii. 460 ff. esp. Jen:Kosmol. 449 ff.) Vid. [[בֵּית דָּגוֹן]] p. III.
